main event: On April 4, 1950, civilians reported seeing a flying saucer in Delano, California.
interesting points: The object was first sighted at 2100 hours by a 17-year-old and his mother., The object was approximately 25 feet in diameter., Witnesses described the object as darting back and forth., The object was observed from 200 feet away., Reports indicated the object was whirling or rotating and reversed its direction of orbit several times.
witness description: civilians including a 17-year-old and his mother, and Mr. & Mrs. from Delano
